t: A look at glamazon through the years - About Amazon
s: November 10, 2020 - Amazon has many employee-led groups, which allow Amazonians to come together across businesses and locations around the world. Some examples include Warriors at Amazon (which includes military veterans and veteran families), Families at Amazon, and Mental Health and Well-Being, among many others.
